column1: Love this face wash because it removes daily grime but also removes makeup. It leaves face feeling smooth and soft and not dried out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
my faces feels clean but not over dried and has a nice scent [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I like the way my face feels and looks after I use it. It doesn't dry my face out like some other cleansers.
really makes skin feel fresh and pores feel so freesh
Keeps my skin clear and soft plus the scent is very light.

I stopped using the cleanser for a few weeks and the results were astonishing! My skin improved almost immediately when I began using the cleanser again! I'll never stop using this awesome product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have a real problem with the packaging for this product. It is very difficult to get it out of the tube. The tube is too stiff and I have to do a toothpaste tube maneuver every time I wash my face. It's quite annoying.

I purchased this because it claims to be foamy and it wasn't very foamy just a tiny bit. Anyways it does smell good to me but i will not be purchasing this again. I don't recommend it for anyone with oily skin as it feels more like a creamy cleanser. It surely doesn't feel like your face is getting very clean. So if you have oily skin you'll just be massaging the oil around on your face with this cleanser.

I love this cleanser. Very refreshing, leave my face feeling very clean but not dried out. My skin feels very soft and supple. This product also is a great makeup remover, without leaving my face dried out or feeling tight. Using moisturizer after using this cleanser feels great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I keep a tube of this cleanser in my shower for my morning face wash and love the fact that it lathers but does not dry out my skin. There isn't another product on the market that I think compares. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used this for a month now and really like how clean it makes my face feel. I use foundation nearly every day and this product does a good job taking off my makeup, no residue on my towel like some other cleansers leave. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using Oil of Olay for over 25 years (I'm 47) and it was the best decision I ever made. This product is mild and keeps my face clean and looking bright! I would recommend this to any and everyone. I have even found my daughter uses mine off and on [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Cleans so well without tearing gentle skin; leaves face and neck feeling clean, fresh, without drying my skin out, leaves it ready for my Olay moisturizers!! I travel for work, always have one in my luggage and another at home so I don't get caught without it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I get a clean fresh face ever time I use olay foaming cleanser ever morning. I have a smooth smells great filling, love this stuff. so nice wakeing up ever morning washing my face. with olay brings a smile to my face ever day,, thank you so much.. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Gentle to the face and smells good. Cleans face well
I love the product! i have used many Olay face wash products but this one is my favorite by far and leave my face feeling so silky.
This stuff works wonderful. I use to use a high cost face wash never seen any result but no wow. That's all I can say is WOW!!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Not drying, not greasy, just right. No offensive odor and the container provides easy handling in the shower. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I do like this cleanser as it doesn't leave my skin feeling dry after use. I seem to have to use quite a bit of it though to get the foaming effect. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recently started using this product after trying others with no results. This product really cleans my face with no residue. Very clean and refreshing results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been with Olay since around 15, it was just great for me, haven't used no other product since then. My skin looks great, and I definitely don't look like 57, which I am. Love all products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used this product for years and would not change for anything! It feels both clean and moisturized at the same time. My skin looks polished and fresh after each use! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved the way my skin felt after using the cleanser. It made my skin feel fresh and baby soft. I could feel the pores opening up and making my skin look and feel healthy. Loved it!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This gets all my makeup off and leaves my skin feeling really clean and soft. Its a good price and does what is says its going to do without any frills [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love the scent and the fresh clean feel, I start and end every day with this product for a fresh clean feel [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love the way this product makes my skin feel. It cleans without making my skin feel dried out. My face feels soft and clean after use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I really like this clanser, it smells great and leaves my skin feeling rejuvinated from outside to in.!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love all olay products. But specially total effects is amazing. I am using this products since last 5-7 years. I always recommend Olay products to my friends and family. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have been using this cleanser for years. It removes makeup very well and leaves my skin very smooth and clean and not oily. Love it!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love this as my night cleaner. It gets all of the make up out of my pores. My face feels clean & soft. I never get blemishes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love the foaming action of this cleanser. It makes my face feel soft and clean - not stripping at all, but a nice clean feel to my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used Olay products for years and love them all! I especially love the Total Effects line...my favorite being the eye cream and the foaming cleanser [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
The foaming cleanser leaves my skin clean and smooth. It removes makeup ,doesn't dry the skin nor sting the eyes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

You only have to use a small amount to get an effective job; it cleans completely and leaves your skin soft and smooth. This is the only cleanser that I would consider using. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love the Total Effects line of products. The revitalizing foaming cleanser makes my skin feel and look great!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this cleanser! Not only is it cleaning, it is making my skin look younger. It feels good on your skin and rinses off well. It smells great too! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product leaves my skin so smooth. It lathers up beautifully and smells so great. Such an affordable price. I love using it day and night.
I can feel my skin is tightening and soft instantly, My skin feels smooth and fresh. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I like the way this product makes my face feel clean with out over drying. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

this is a refreshing and compete wash that you will love to use! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
